Package com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.text

Interface Summary
UnixTerminalSizeQuerier This class allows you to override by what means Lanterna detects the size of the terminal.
 

Class Summary
ANSITerminal A common ANSI text terminal implementation
CygwinTerminal This class is trying to provide some special workarounds in order to function in Cygwin terminal environments.
FixedTerminalSizeProvider Using this terminal size provider, your terminal will be set to a fixed size and will never resize.
StreamBasedTerminal An abstract terminal implementing functionality for terminals using OutputStream/InputStream
UnixTerminal A common ANSI terminal extention with support for Unix resize signals and the stty program to control cbreak and key echo
 

Enum Summary
UnixTerminal.Behaviour This enum lets you control some more low-level behaviors of this terminal object.
